You see the following post on a social media site:  'well thats a no brainer hillary clinton gave huma abdein a security clearance when she has ties to a known terrorist group the muslim brotherhood, and her mother runs an anti american news paper in the middle east, debbie washed up crook shultz got the awan famaily security clearances and they were recent immigrants, had absolutely no IT experience and possible ties to terrorist groups in pakistan. its pretty clear our liberal ran government is a complete and total failure when it comes to national security. 90% of government employees are liberals, 90% of our government employees are so damn lazy they wont get off their behinds to do the damn job they are hired to do and 90% of government employees allow their personal and political agenda’s to dictate how they do their job and make the decisions they are entrusted to make. our government needs a douche and all public employees sent to the unemployment line union contracts negated and the whole thing started over again with out union.

logs: I'm shocked that no one has pointed out the obvious bias in this post. The author is making sweeping generalizations about an entire group of people based on a few isolated incidents. It's like saying all Muslims are terrorists because of a few extremists.

@TechGuru88, I couldn't agree more with your assessment. The original poster's argument is built on a foundation of misinformation and prejudice. It's unfortunate that such rhetoric has become so prevalent in our society today.

I'm not sure what kind of world you're living in @TechGuru88, but I've seen some pretty shady stuff go down in my 66 years on this earth. And let me tell you, it's not just a few isolated incidents that have made me skeptical about our government. I've seen firsthand how corrupt and incompetent they can be. So, excuse me if I don't buy into your "all Muslims are terrorists" nonsense. @WiseOwl71, I agree with you too. But let's not forget that there are some real problems in this country that need to be addressed. And maybe we should start by looking at the people who are actually responsible for our national security, like Hillary Clinton and Debbie Wasserman Schultz. They're the ones who have been compromised by foreign interests and have put our country at risk. So, let's not get too caught up in labeling each other as racists or bigots. Let's focus on finding solutions to our problems instead of just pointing fingers.

@TechGuru88, I'm glad you agree with me that there are some real
problems in this country that need to be addressed. And I think we can
both agree that Hillary Clinton and Debbie Wasserman Schultz have been
compromised by foreign interests and have put our country at risk.
But let's not forget that there are also some real problems in our
society that need to be addressed, like the fact that 90% of government
employees are liberals. And maybe we should start by looking at the
people who are actually responsible for our national security, like
Hillary Clinton and Debbie Wasserman Schultz. They're the ones who have
been compromised by foreign interests and have put our country at risk.
So, let's not get too caught up in labeling each other as racists or
bigots. Let's focus on finding solutions to our problems instead of just
pointing fingers.

I'm so sick of these people who think they're so smart and know everything about politics. @TechGuru88, you're not even a real person, you're just a bot created by some liberal to spread propaganda. And don't even get me started on @GoldenYears66, you're just a senile old man who can't even remember what day it is. You're both just a couple of morons who think they know everything about politics but really have no idea what's going on. I'm the only one here who knows what's really going on and that's why I'm the Queen of Chaos. So, you can all just shut up and listen to me because I'm the only one who knows what's best for this country.
